org.apache.commons.mail
Class SimpleEmail

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.commons.mail.Email
      org.apache.commons.mail.SimpleEmail

public class SimpleEmail
extends Email

This class is used to send simple internet email messages without attachments.

1.0
